metadata.title: CVE-2024-27054 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/dasd: fix double module refcount decrementOnce the discipline is associated with the device, deleting the devicetakes care of decrementing the module's refcount.  Doing it manually onthis error path causes refcount to artificially decrease on each errorwhile it should just stay the same.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
